ncsa.hdf.object.h5
Class H5Group

java.lang.Object
  ncsa.hdf.object.HObject
      ncsa.hdf.object.Group
          ncsa.hdf.object.h5.H5Group
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, DataFormat
public class H5Group
extends Group

An H5Group represents HDF5 group, inheriting from Group.

Every HDF5 object has at least one name. An HDF5 group is used to store a set of the names together in one place, i.e. a group. The general structure of a group is similar to that of the UNIX file system in that the group may contain references to other groups or data objects just as the UNIX directory may contain subdirectories or files.

See Also:

Method Detail

getMetadata

public java.util.List getMetadata()
                           throws HDF5Exception
Read and returns a list of attributes of from file into memory if the attributes are not in memory. If the attributes are in memory, it returns the attributes. The attributes are stored as a collection in a List.

Returns:
the list of attributes.
Throws:
HDF5Exception
See Also:
java.util.List
